Trigger: water of Moisture Sensor is dry
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Motion sensor detects human in a room
Action: set the goal temperature of the air conditioner to a specific one.
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Motion sensor detects no human in a room
Action: set the goal temperature of the air conditioner to a wide range
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Temperature is high (or time in summer)
Action: set light bulb hue to higher. (blue?)
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Action: set light bulb hue to lower. (orange?)
